Specimen Container(s): Printed filter paper with carrier device
Printed filter paper with carrier device and demographic form
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Blood spot collection on filter paper
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PerkinElmer 226 Sample Collection Device for collecting and transporting whole blood specimen spots in newborn screening
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as a medium to collect and transport whole blood specimen spots to a laboratory in newborn screening, with a tear-apart form for collection of demographic information
